column4: Can I download a file over HTTP directly to an FTP account I have on another server?  I don't have shell access on the FTP account, it's just a cheap hosting site
I want to download a podcast from an RSS feed directly to the FTP account
can curl or something do this?
curl would require you to have a shell account on the ftp account thing.  No amount of scripting will remove you from the equation, it'll just make it less visible for you.
